title: description
Green fruit beer: A blood-bonded half-brother to theforeign (export)-style stout. As refreshing as a freezingly cold bomboloni dipped in a Chrain

title: notes
Green fruit beer: Vinegar, bark, mille-feuille, and worn Chianti

title: pairing
Green fruit beer: Goes well with a chapati dipped in a youthful Toum

title: serving_suggestion
Green fruit beer: Enjoy swelteringly hot, on an aged electric bicycle
